author: nspiegelberg
msg: avoid log spew for regions already in compaction queue
We were debug logging compaction requests even in cases the region was already
Small diff to only report when the region is *actually* added to the compaction
queue. Also now print the pending compaction queue whenever a compaction is
* run on cluster and check the new messages.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: HBASE-2933 : Skip EOF Errors during Log Recovery
If we get an EOF error during log recovery, the file was transferred fine but
contains bad application-level information, either due to a write/parse error or
master death while splitting.  Either way, we should continue instead of failing
and having the master reassign this region to another server and continue the

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Added to help us debug EOF problems that we've been seeing

author: nspiegelberg
msg: HBASE_SLEEP_TIMEOUT is used to determine that an RS connection is hosed so you
can move to the next one.  For our uber-large, uber-loaded clusters, a legit
stop can take 1-2 minutes.  Raise this threshold.  Long-term solution = bound
